gurmukhi: khw Brm ko krm hY khw Brm ko nws ]
transliteration: Kahaa Bharam Ko Karam Hai Kahaa Bharam Ko Naas||
translation: How an action is recompensed? How and illusion is destroyed?

gurmukhi: khw icqn kI cystw khw Acyq pRkws ]8]208]
transliteration: Kahaa Chitan Koo Chestaa Kahaa Achet Prakaas||8||208||
translation: What are the cravings of the mind? And what is the carefree illumination? 8.208.

gurmukhi: khw nym sMjm khw khw igAwn AigAwn ]
transliteration: Kahaa Nem Sanjam Kahaa Kahaa Giaan Agiaan||
translation: What are the observance and restraint? What are the knowledge and nescience

gurmukhi: ko rogI sogI kvn khw Drm kI hwn ]9]209]
transliteration: Ko Rogoo Sogoo Kavan Kahaa Dharam Koo Haan||9||209||
translation: Who is ailing and who is sorrowful, and where does the downfall of Dharma occur? 9.209.

gurmukhi: ko sUrw suMdr kvn khw jog ko swr ]
transliteration: Ko Sooraa Soundar Kavan Kahaa Jog Ko Saar||
translation: Who is hero and who is beautiful? What is the essence of Yoga?

gurmukhi: ko dwqw igAwnI kvn kho ibcwr Aibcwr ]10]210]
transliteration: Ko Daataa Giaanoo Kavan Kaho Bichaar Abichaar||10||210||
translation: Who is the Donor and who is the Knower? Tell me the judicious and injudicious.10.210.
BY TH GRACE DIRAGH TRIBGANGI STANZA

gurmukhi: durjn dl dMfx Asur ibhMfx dust inkMdix Awid biRqy ]
transliteration: Durjan Dal Danndan Asur Bihanndan Doust Nikandan(i) Aadh Brite||
translation: Thy Nature from the very beginning is to punish the multitudes of vicious people, to destroy the demons and to uproot the tyrants.

gurmukhi: cCrwsur mwrix piqq auDwrix nrk invwrix gUVH gqy ]
transliteration: Chachhraasur Maaran(i) Patit Udhaaran(i) Narak Nivaaran(i) Goodh Gade||
translation: Thou hast profound discipline of killing the demon named Chachhyar, of liberating the sinners and saving them from hell.

gurmukhi: ACY AKMfy qyj pRcMfy KMf audMfy AlK mqy ]
transliteration: Achhai Akhannde Tej Prachanndde Khannd Udannde Alakh Mate||
translation: Thy intellect is incomprehensible, Thou art Immortal, Indivisible, Supremely Glorious and Unpunishable Entity.

gurmukhi: jY jY hosI mihKwsur mrdn rMm kprdl C`qR iCqy ]1]211]
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Ranm Kapardan Chattra Chhite||1||211||
translation: Hail, hail, the Canopy of the world, the slayer of Mahishasura, wearing the knot of elegant long hair on Thy head. 1.211.
